info.kontaktirajte_nas-vpr: If you have any questions you can write to us here:

vprasanja.o1: YES! The beach is close, only about 60m (2 min. on foot).
vprasanja.v2: Is there any space to socialize outside?
vprasanja.o2: Yes. Each house has an outdoor space with barbecue and table.
vprasanja.v3: Do all apartments have air conditioning?
vprasanja.o3: Yes. Each apartment has its own air conditioning and remote control.
vprasanja.v4: Is there a surcharge for air conditioning?
vprasanja.o4: No! Air conditioning is not charged separately.
